transcript:
Customer: Hello. Hello. Hello.
Executive: Hello sir, IndiaMART la irunthu call pannirukken sir, morning kooda nadanthathu.
Customer: Sollunga sir.
Executive: Sir athan sir, by leads issue sonningala, sort out pannurathukaga call pannen.
Customer: Oru oru nimisham.
Executive: Amma.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Sir athan sir, by leads issue iruku, avar varala appidinnu sollirunthingala, so atha sort out pannurathukaga than call pannen.
Customer: Appo.
Executive: Ippo unga app open pannikiringala.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Open pannitenga sir.
Customer: Okay sir, mela intha recent relevant athuku pakathula parunga catalog views irukum, athuku pakathula past leads irukanu parunga.
Executive: Sir mela vanthu relevant recent tenders.
Customer: Athuku mela athuku pakathula parunga catalog view nu irukingala onu.
Executive: Mobile la thane pakuringa sir.
Customer: Amanga sir mobile la catalog view illa sir.
Executive: Mela enna show aaguthu sir, recent relevant pakathula.
Customer: Tenders sir.
Executive: Athuku pakathula ethu.
Customer: Avlo than sir.
Executive: Moonu option than show aaguthula.
Customer: Amanga sir, moonu option than sir kamikum.
Executive: [unintelligible]
Executive: Namakku whatsapp number iruntha irunga sir, intha number than whatsapp number ah.
Customer: Ithaan sir whatsapp.
Executive: Appdiye ore nimisham antha number mattum solringala whatsapp number.
Customer: 8610.
Executive: 8610.
Customer: 48.
Customer: 48.
Customer: 57.
Executive: Puriyala sir.
Customer: 57.
Customer: 57 53.
Executive: Sir appdiye antha screen shot mattum enaku share panniringa sir, ungaluku issue aaguthunnu.
Customer: Share pannirenga sir.
Executive: Aay poitturukken sir.
Customer: Ah okay okay.
Executive: Send pannitenga sir.
Executive: Sir andha tenders ku mela vanthutu three dot irukula sir.
Customer: Amanga sir.
Executive: Atha click panni parunga athula vanthutu past leads nu oru option show aaguthanu.
Customer: Ah iruku sir.
Executive: Ah iruku sir, athu ulla poirunga sir.
Customer: Ulla poidunga sir.
Executive: Okay sir, ippo athula vanthutu sold out and by leads ellame show aagum ungaluku.
Customer: Amanga sir.
Executive: So athula vanthutu nammudaiya product ah irukanu solli paathutu athu nammudaiya product ah irunthuchina I am interested nu mattum mark panna sollunga athula.
Customer: Hmm okay sir.
Executive: Athula nammudaiya product thane sir athu.
Customer: Ah iruku sir, oru sila iruku sir.
Executive: Ah athu enna enna product varuthu nammudaiya product ah athu mattum I am interested nu solli athula mark pannunga.
Customer: Ah okay sir.
Executive: Ippo ithu vanthutu oru three to four days ku munnadi receive aana by leads ellame, still paathinga oru two days la by leads post aagala intha ithuku, actually enna na bayir oda requirements iruku, bayir ku vanthutu requirements irunthu by leads post pannanga appidinnu athu automatic ah receive aagum, so namma ethu vanthutu ovvoru customers ku share pannurathu illa based on market oda demands porutha, sarigala.
Customer: Sari sari sir.
Executive: Ithula vanthutu neenga I am interested nu solli neenga mark pannunga, ithoda by leads um increase aagura maari paathinga na ungaluku support panni kodukren, ithula neenga ithula mattum neenga mark panni kodunga I am interested nu.
Executive: Itha vanthutu ungaluku eppo eppo by leads oda flow kammiya iruko so antha times la ellame neenga by leads ku varingala, so appo antha times la ungaluku past leads la mattum neenga vanthutu mark pannunga I am interested nu solli neenga mark pannunga.
Customer: Ah okay okay sir.
Executive: Mark pannumbothu intha maari by leads paathinga ungaluku sold out aagaathu, ellame neenga eduthuruka maatinga, neenga edukaamal sold out aana by leads ellame.
Customer: Oh okay okay sir.
Executive: Ithu neenga vanthutu first edukura oru naalu customers ku than paathinga intha by leads inga show aagum, maybe neenga paakaatha times la kooda oru naalu sellers purchase panni ithu sold out aayirukum, so athanala ungaluku intha idathula vanthurukum, I am interested nu solli neenga mark pannunga, next time intha categories la by leads post pannuranga appidinnu automatic ah nammaluku vanthu receive aagum.
Customer: Okay okay sir, sarigala, so na intha concern na eduthukren, na ungaluku by leads oda flow mattum na increase panni kodukren, sarigala.
Customer: Ah okay sir.
Executive: Okay sir, so athu illama nammaluku ethavathu doubts appidinnu nammaluku account manager irukanga, account manager aangaathu.
Customer: Account manager illanga sir.
Executive: Okay, okay sir, na account manager vanthutu ungaluku na text panna sollana call panna solren naalaiki, avanga vanthu neenga vanthutu follow pannikonga sir, ethavathu issue na neenga direct ah avangalukke call pannunga.
Customer: Ah okay sir.
Executive: Okay sir, so ethavathu concern appidinnu neenga direct ah avangalukke call pannunga, sari ippo namma intha by leads issue nu solli oru concern raise pannirukomla, so athu close pannikonga sir ippo.
Customer: Ah okay sir.
Executive: Okay sir, na close pannirren, just ore oru feedback mattum varum, so na eppadi ungalukku communicate pannen appidinnu oru feedback mattum varum mail la, athu mattum konjam paathukonga sir, sarigala.
Customer: Ah okay sir.
Executive: Okay sir, so ennodaiya number kooda neenga save pannikonga, again by leads la ethavathu issue irunthuchina neenga account manager aagattum illa enakku aagattum neenga inform pannunga, na ungaluku sort out panni tharen, sarigala.
Customer: Ah okay sir.
Executive: Sari okay sir okay, okay sir, thank you so much sir.
Customer: Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer reported an issue with byleads.

- Customer unable to find catalog view option.



Resolution:

- Executive called to resolve the byleads issue.

- Executive provided steps to find past leads.

- Executive asked to mark 'I am interested' in past leads.

- Executive offered to increase byleads flow.

- Executive offered to have account manager contact customer.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will close the byleads issue.

- Customer to provide feedback via email.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog view, account manager, feedback
